pages.title: Electrum
pages.text: Electrum is an alloy made from Silver and Gold, and an alternative to Diamond.$(br)Tools and armor made of this material aren't as durable as their diamond counterpart, albeit keeping the same speed and strength. It has a very good enchantability.$(br2)DURABILITY: $(l)MEDIUM$()$(br)MINING SPEED: $(l)8$()$(br)ATTACK DAMAGE: $(l)7$()$(br)ENCHANTABILITY: $(l)HIGH
Raw Electrum can be smelted into ingots either by a Furnace or a Blast Furnace. Tools and armor must be crafted using individual pieces of Electrum.
